How to earn trust:
1 Do not lie (to others or yourself) 2 Do not cheat 3 Do not pretend 4 Do not manipulate 5 Do not hide the truth 6 Say what you mean, gracefully 7 Deliver on your promises 8 Give trust 9 Explain your decisions 10 Share your intent 11 Do not defend dishonesty.
